mapper.subject: ‚úÖ You are now confirmed for early access
mapper.html:
Hi {{1.name}},

Welcome to the early access list for Worktugal Accounting Desk.

You are now on our priority list. We open new booking slots in small batches. When a slot is available, you will receive an invite by email.

What you can do while you wait:

1. Keep your NIF and any Finan√ßas letters ready.
2. Write down your main questions so we can focus on you.
3. Check your inbox and spam so you do not miss our message.

Sent automatically by Worktugal server
From: Worktugal Accounting Desk <hello@worktugal.com>
You can reply to this email if needed.
